mapper.insert:
insert into free_board (user_id, subject, content, register_time) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, now())
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select fb.article_no, fb.user_id, m.user_nickname, fb.subject, fb.content, fb.article_hit, register_time from free_board fb join trip_member m on fb.user_id = m.user_id order by fb.article_no desc

select fb.article_no, fb.user_id, m.user_nickname, fb.subject, fb.content, fb.article_hit, register_time from free_board fb join trip_member m on fb.user_id = m.user_id where fb.subject like concat('%', #{word}, '%') order by fb.article_no desc

select fb.article_no, fb.user_id, m.user_nickname, fb.subject, fb.content, fb.article_hit, register_time from free_board fb join trip_member m on fb.user_id = m.user_id where fb.article_no = #{articleNo}
